titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1833) to amend title 18, United States Code, to ban partial-birth abortions.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-301, by Mrs. Waldholtz.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1833 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary now printed in the bill shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 109.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 190 (Roll no. 754).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/31/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the closed rule for the consideration of H.R. 1833 (late-term abortion procedures).
